title: WWE '12
description: NOTE: ONLINE MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT FOR THIS TITLE WAS TERMINATED ON 10/29/2013.  ONLINE/MULTIPLAYER FEATURES ARE NOT ACTIVE OR INCLUDED. The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Every champion must reinvent himself, and every Superstar has an evolution.  Reinvented with each challenge, always primed and ready to strike with more edge and intensity than ever before, he is reborn – bigger, badder and better.  FINALLY … the WWE experience you've been demanding has arrived!  THQ's flagship franchise in the company’s WWE videogame portfolio is reborn, delivering the best and most realistic WWE action ever.  With new Predator Technology™, an overhauled gameplay experience and new broadcast TV presentation that promises the most fluid, dynamic, authentic and action-packed WWE simulation experience to date, WWE '12 gives you more control over WWE than ever before.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Official WWE '12 Theme
childDownloads.description: Download your official WWE '12 themes today!  All in the bold new WWE '12 art style with WWE Superstars John Cena, "The Viper" Randy Orton,  and CM Punk!  Bigger. Badder. Better.

childDownloads.title: Road to WrestleMania Trailer
childDownloads.description: In the Road to WrestleMania, you will need to be a Villain, an Outsider, and a Hero.  What challenges will you face?

childDownloads.title: Alberto Del Rio Luxury RC Car
childDownloads.description: Alberto Del Rio loves expensive cars…but you already know that! Equip your Avatar with the coolest Alberto Del Rio Luxury RC Car around!

childDownloads.title: WWE '12 Fan Axxess
childDownloads.description: Fan Axxess is premium content for the ultimate WWE fan. With its purchase you get the All Unlockables and WWE Superstar Attribute Customizer. Fan Axxess is also a discounted pre-payment for all future WWE'12 downloadable content. Please note: This purchase does not include Online Axxess, The Miz's Awesome Attires, or WWE Superstars The Rock and Kane. Visit wwe.thq.com for more details.

childDownloads.description: Goldust is one of the most flamboyant performers in the history WWE. Equip your Avatar with his full outfit today and everybody will remember your name!

In Stores November 25th.
